programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Kevin Tien pushes Bobby Flays Titans to the limit. Plus, everything is put on the line for judge Chris Scott in an epic battle of "Cajun Asian" flavours.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.sub-title: I Doughnut Know What to Think!
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Bittersweet Victory. Home cook Sherria Watt rises to the challenge of a chocolate-themed bake-off against celebrity baker Duff Goldman.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Fillet Frenzy. Its sink or swim for home cook Lydia Wexler as she takes on the renowned Chef Michael Voltaggio in an intense salmon showdown.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chopped Sweets
programme.desc: Exciting cooking competition show, spin-off of the popular Chopped and hosted by Scott Conant- celebrity chef, restaurateur and cookbook author, features four chefs who are tasked with making dessert dishes and the winner gets $10,000 prize. Every episode begins with four contestants, trained pastry chefs, who in each of the three rounds receive four mystery items that they must incorporate into their desserts, demonstrating their skill, concentration and imagination. Culinary professionals who serve as judges eliminate one chef at a time. After three rounds, a champion is named, and the winner leaves with the money.

Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kook

programme.title: Veidrad toidud
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: Ted Allen hosts this hearty American cooking show that sees four little chefs showcasing their cooking abilities as they prepare and present delicious dishes for the chance to win a whopping $10,000 cash prize. The delicious treats and competitive format is bound to leave you wanting more.

programme.desc: Artisan cake-makers face off in this cooking competition series hosted by Italian-American chef Giada De Laurentiis, hoping they have what it takes to take home the $10,000 prize. Not only must these baked masterpieces taste delicious, but they are also judged on their visual aesthetics, pushing the contestants talents like never before. programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. programme.title: Restaurant
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Basique, le concert
programme.desc: " BASIQUE, LE CONCERT : BENJAMIN BIOLAY " Apr√®s le triomphe de lalbum et de la tournee Grand Prix (disque de platine, deux Victoires de la Musique en 2020, tournee √† guichets fermes) Benjamin Biolay revient avec Saint-Clair, son 10e album original. Classe numero un des ventes √† sa sortie, Saint-Clair est un album resolument rock et taille pour la sc√®ne. programme.title: Turkish Airlines EuroLeague
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Guinness Six Nations
programme.desc: The Six Nations Championship is an annual international mens rugby union competition between the rugby teams of England, France, Ireland, Italy, Scotland, and Wales. Its format is quite simple: each team plays every other team once making a total of 15 matches, with home ground advantage alternating from one year to the next. The current champions are England, who won the 2020 tournament.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: ONE Championship
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Get ready for explosive action and jaw-dropping knockouts as Top Rank Boxing brings you a series of exhilarating bouts in the ring. From heavyweight showdowns to thrilling lightweight clashes, experience the power, skill, and determination of the worlds best fighters as they vie for the ultimate prize. Strap in and prepare for heart-pounding excitement as Top Rank Boxing presents a lineup of must-see fights that will leave you on the edge of your seat. Dont miss a moment of the hard-hitting action!

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.desc: With their six kids almost grown up, a couple hope to find a lake house to bring the whole family together. They also need garden space for their dog.

programme.title: Lotov√µitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Templiruutlite kadunud jaanused

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Hitleri jalil
programme.desc: Bobi ja Johni juurdlus viib nad P√µhja-Hispaaniasse, kus uks salastatud dokument vaidab, et Hitler ja talle lahedal seisev isik Leon Degrelle v√µisid minna Taanist Hispaaniasse.

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Radio host Jimmy Church (Fade to Black, Coast to Coast AM) and a dedicated group of truth-seekers are hitting the road and investigating the biggest mysteries, controversies, and conspiracies of our strange world including: A possible covert undersea UFO base hidden off the California Coast. Is it possible that a popular virtual smartphone game might actually be part of a CIA operation? Did the U.S. government create an army of mind-controlled assassins? Plus a look into a possible plot to assassinate President John Kennedy just weeks before the tragic events in Dallas. A search for lost Confederate gold. A new Bigfoot hotspot where you least expect it. A new theory on time travel and missing nuclear weapons right here in America. We seek disclosure, answers and the truth. We seek to understand The Unexplained.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Countdown to Apocalypse
programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Teise maailmas√µja kadunud kuld
programme.desc: Kui meeskond laheneb tunnelile, mis v√µib olla aardelaburindi osa, saab Bingo teada, et osa diktaator Ferdinand Marcose varandusest v√µidi Yamashita aarde seast varastada. Ta paljastab v√µimaliku seose CIA vanden√µuga.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Countdown to Apocalypse
programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi is determined to disprove the theories of the so-called pyramidiots, who believe that there are secret underground chambers leading to the Sphinx. Little did anyone know that these caves were home to thousands of bats!

programme.title: Jumalate kokkup√µrge
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Endine USA merevae radarioperaator ilmub valja ja raagib kohutavast paevast, mil UFO-sid taevast alla sadas. USA merevae tootajad paljastavad uusi andmeid, millest selgub ka see, miks UFO-sid tihti ookeani kohal nahakse.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: WW2 Treasure Hunters is a television programme that looks at a whole range of historical artefacts and all the untold stories, of the conflict . In unearthing forgotten stories, you gain a real understanding of the biggest modern war in military history. Militia experts, survivors and historians, this show merges all of these important figures together so you can gain a real understanding of WW2. Starring Stephen Taylor, Ben Major and amateur relic hunter, Suggs, it creates a real personal attachment between the viewer and the presenters. Detecting, reflecting and dissecting stories, this talented threesome explain using experts and survivors the true detrimental effects of WW2. With most of the artefacts being found in the UK, you will gain a true historical knowledge of the Blitz.

programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.desc: Vance Joy takes a solo stroll through a couple of wondrous little tunes from his debut album, Dream Your Life Away.

programme.sub-title: Duran Duran _ The Reunion Tour: Live at Wembley
programme.desc: Filmed at Wembley Arena, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Duran Duran featuring unforgettable version of their hits: "Rio", "Hungry Like The Wolf", "The Reflex" and many more‚Ä¶

programme.title: Radiohead - The King of Limbs

programme.desc: The King of Limbs: Live from the Basement is a 2011 live video album by the English alternative rock band Radiohead, performing their eighth album, The King of Limbs (2011).

programme.title: X Ambassadors - A Garage Gig
programme.desc: X Ambassadors slam through a heroic offering of power and emotion in this intense new Garage Gig.

programme.desc: Get your fill of riff-oriented heavy rock with this dark and moody performance by Queens of the Stone Age. Best enjoyed with the volume turned up high!

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Prince - The Unauthorized Biography
programme.desc: Documentary focusing on the legendary musicians life and work, from his troubled childhood in Minneapolis to becoming one of the most popular and innovative artists in contemporary music.

programme.title: Rodrigo y Gabriela - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The mexican duet takes the stage at Garorock Festival, in July 2014.

programme.title: Coldplay _ Phenomenon
programme.desc: In the space of just three amazing albums Coldplay have transformed from unknowns to international superstars. Drawing on archive film and interviews with the band, a team of leading music critics and musicians reveal the secrets behind the Coldplay phenomenon. The result is the most hard hitting frank and penetrating review of the music and personalities which shaped the Coldplay phenomenon ever produced. Featuring highlights from: Speed of Sound, Politik, The Scientist, Yellow, Clocks, Trouble, Fix You, In My Place and more...

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Bibi Bourelly - Live at Eurockeennes
programme.desc: Watch Bibi Bourellys live performance at Eurockeennes in 2016.

programme.title: Lana Del Rey _ Live in London
programme.desc: Born to Die is the second album by singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey, and the first to be officially released on January 27, 2012 and that would lead to global success; In countries such as the United Kingdom the album was the best selling of that year, that recognition made her a guest of honor in one of the most popular London festivals iTunes Festival, where she would open the awe of all attendees on the night of September 25 2012 at the Roundhouse in the city of London.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti: A Classic Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Milky Chance - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The German duet is back and better than ever! Milky Chance is the success story of two school friends, Clemens Rehbein and Philipp Dausch. After a long break, 2017 marks the release of a second, long-waited, album ""Blossom"". And, for the public, finally the occasion to discover live these new compositions, mixing rock, folk and electro pop. With reggae vibrations that can rub shoulders with house elements, Milky Chance has one of the most singular sounds. With the presence of musicians on stage, and if we believe the listening of the new record, we can expect more electric concerts, more electronic and even more energetic than in the past!

programme.title: Lenny Kravitz - Live at the iTunes Festival
programme.desc: Lenny Kravitz has been consolidated as one of the stars that has been in force for a long time, this has led him to appear all over the world and be part of the most popular festivals in the world. This is how on September 26, 2014 he was invited to participate in one of the UKs most popular festivals, the iTunes Festival, giving his audience a great concert at the Roundhouse of London.

programme.title: Iggy Pop - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: The Doobie Brothers - Live At Wolf Trap
programme.desc: Filmed in high definition on 25 July 2004 at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts in Virginia, "Live At Wolf Trap" captures The Doobie Brothers in fine form on a set that mixes classic hits with some rarely performed tracks from across their extensive catalogue. This would prove to be the last recorded footage of long time drummer Keith Knudsen performing with the Doobie Brothers prior to his sad death from cancer in February 2005.

programme.title: The Who
programme.sub-title: The Who: Live At the Isle Of Wight Festival
programme.desc: In 2004 The Who returned to the Isle Of Wight Festival for the first time since their legendary performance in 1970. After a long absence, the festival had been reborn in 2002 and continues to this day. Their UK concerts in 2004 were the first in their home country since the death of founder member John Entwistle. As the evening shadows lengthened across the festival site, The Who took to the stage and delivered an incendiary performance packed with hit singles and classic album tracks and the concert more than lived up to the fans expectations and memories of 1970.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Blur was formed in the late 1980s when all four members were attending Londons Goldsmiths College. However lead signer Damon Albarn and guitarist Graham Coxon had actually known each other since childhood, growing up together in Colchester. With bassist Alex James and drummer Dave Rowntree, the band began playing under the name of Seymour, after a character created by J D Salinger, but they soon changed that to Blur to secure a deal with Food Records. After their debut Shes So High failed to trouble the top of the charts, Blur teamed up with producer Stephen Street. They had immediate success with the single Theres No Other Way. Upon its release, Blurs debut album, Leisure, failed to make the impact Food Records had hoped for but the band had a musical turning point with the release of the single Popscene. It had a distinctly English sound and is often credited as being the very first Britpop song. Blur decided to take on a quintessentially English style and image for their second album, Modern Life is Rubbish. By hanging on to their newfound English heritage, commercial fortunes would change for Blur in 1994 with the release of the single Girls and Boys. The success of Girls and Boys propelled the bands third album, Parklife, to enter the charts at number one.

programme.title: T√µelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case ‚Äì sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: The 1980s
programme.desc: Although the 1980s is one of the most fondly remembered decades, it was also a deadly one. This nostalgic crime documentary series looks beyond the big hair, bright and bold make-up, leg-warmers, electronic pop music, yuppie culture and classic movies. This series delves in the sinister side of the decade, revealing some of the more shocking events that took place at this time. Real-life murders are re-enacted. Whilst investigators are still grappling with questions about these horrific crimes after all these years. Shocking tales from all over the USA, from the death of a teenage cheerleader in California to mass murder in Missouri and homicide amongst New Yorks elite - this series may make you think differently about 1980 forever.

programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. programme.title: The Lies That Bind
programme.desc: A true-crime series that exposes the sinister secrets and dark betrayals that are often involved in heinous crimes of murder. Sometimes the secret or lie can appear innocent at first but they are soon revealed to have life-altering consequences. Or the indiscretion or flasehood can be deliberately misleading in order to protect the guilty. Investigators have to determine which witness accounts are true and which are false or deceitful. Episodes include stories such as when Louisiana Melton and her boyfriend Phillip Brown are found shot dead and the investigating officer uncovers a huge lie that sheds light on the crime; or when Lisa Moore goes missing shortly after ending her marriage and her family fear the worst; or when a pastors wife is killed when the parsonage is burned down and the fire marshall uncovers a damaging secret.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: Host, and former federal prosecutor, Sunny Hostin (from The View) takes us on an investigative journey to uncover the true stories of crime victims and their loved ones. Unlike most crime shows which focus on the motives or backstory of the killers, this show exposes the real, deadly impact on those who suffer at the hands of the perpetrator. The stories of everyday people who get caught up in these heinous crimes often go unheard and it is equally important that these individuals get to tell their stories as it is for us to hear them. Sunny also interviews the detectives, prosecutors, coroners, and others involved to piece together the truth of each case. With an intention to be socially inclusive, the show highlights stories concerning people of color, women and the LGBTQ community.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer

In this true-crime documentary series, a team of dedicated experts led by detective Mike Arntfield attempt to solve murder cases that have gone cold, bringing closure to victims families. By re-enacting the crimes, uncovering new evidence, talking with friends and family members, and using 21st century technology, the team of passionate investigators hunt down every lead in order to solve the case.

programme.title: Tsoi
programme.desc: Pavel ≈†elest ei armasta elus jarske muutusi, ja on alati puudnud kaituda uhiskondlikke norme jargides. Aga tal ei vea: 1990. aasta 15. augustil kihutab Sloka-Talsi maanteetrassil tema juhitud bussile taiskiirusel otsa Viktor Tsoi Moskvit≈°. Miljonite iidol hukkub koha peal. Pavel ei teadnud lauljast midagi ega olnud ka tema laule kuulnud. Samuti polnud tal aimugi, et parast seda saatuslikku kokkup√µrget ei saa ta oma rahulikult kulgenud elu enam mitte kunagi tagasi.

programme.title: Territoorium

programme.title: Vahetatud pulmad
programme.desc: Supermodell Sonja unistab pere√µnnest koos ennast tais telesaatejuhi Ruslaniga, kuid too ei kipu Sonja unistusi jagama. Kattemaksuks otsustab Sonja abielluda tavalise pangaametniku Aleksandriga, kes ongi sellega n√µus - samamoodi kattemaksuks oma armsamale. Juba perekonnaametist valjudes m√µistavad noored, et nad on oma otsusega kiirustanud. Kuid enam pole midagi parata - nuud ei jaa neil muud ule kui vastastikust vihkamist varjates √µnnelikku paari mangida. Kuid vihkamisest on armastuseni vaid uks samm.

programme.title: Kuum tibi
programme.desc: Menukomoodia kuumast tibist, kes arkab uhel hommikul 30-aastase mehe (Rob Schneider) kehas. Jessica on kooli populaarseim tudruk, ta on cheerleader ja kaib jalgpallimeeskonna kapteniga. See k√µik muutub hoobilt, kui iidse needuse tagajarjel vahetab Jessica kehad endast tublisti vanema mehega. Shokist toibudes uritab Jessica tulutult enda naiselikku valimust taastada. programme.title: Alexander Ekman, "Hammer"
programme.desc: Julge, ettearvamatu ja uuenduslik. Balletitantsija ja koreograaf Alexander Ekman kritiseerib humoorikal moel meie tanapaeva maailma, mis paljude jaoks tahendab vaid enesest jaetavat kuvandit. Moodne elu toob kaasa inimese allakaigu, kui algselt uhtne kogukond muutub uha individualistlikumaks ja egoistlikumaks. Ekman pilab kaasaja vaarastunud vaartusi, abiks Goteborgi ooperiteatri balletitrupp.

programme.title: Richter, the Enigma
programme.desc: Richter, the Enigma Prokofievs 9th Sonata was dedicated to him, he played at Stalins funeral with Oistrakh and Rostropovitch and accompanied Schwarzkopf and Fischer-Dieskau: Sviatoslav Richter was THE Soviet pianist par excellence. This portrait, illustrated with rare and unpublished archival documents from the 1950s to the artists death, gives a view of life in Soviet Russia from the perspective of one of the greatest and yet most enigmatic world pianists. Directed by Bruno Monsaingeon 1997

programme.title: McCoy Tyner Trio live at Estival Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. McCoy Tyners first main exposure came with Benny Golson, being the first pianist in Golsons and Art Farmers Jazztet. Hes also known for his work with the John Coltrane Quartet. Tyners style is easily comparable to Coltranes maximalist style of saxophone. Though a member of Coltranes group, he was never overshadowed by the saxophonist, but complemented and even inspired Coltranes open-minded approach. McCoy Tyner is considered one of the most influential jazz pianists of the 20th century, an honour he earned both with Coltrane and in his years of performing following Coltranes death.

programme.title: Leeds International Piano Competition
programme.desc: Leeds International Piano Competition Royal Liverpool Philharmonic Orchestra, Domingo Hindoyan (direction) Jaeden Izik-Dzurko (Canada) - 1st Prize Johannes Brahms 1833 - 1897 Piano Concerto no 2 in B flat major op. 83 Junyan Chen (China) - 2nd Prize Sergei Rachmaninov 1873 - 1943 Piano Concerto No. 4 in G minor, Op. 40 Khanh Nhi Luong (Vietnam) - 3rd Prize Sergei Prokofiev 1891 - 1953 Piano Concerto no 3 in C major, Op. 26 Leeds International Piano Competition, 20-21 September 2024 Today we will follow the journey of three participants in the Leeds International Piano Competition. From 11 to 21 September 2024, young pianists from all over the world came to this city in central England to submit to the jury chaired by Imogen Cooper. Who among them will add their name to Radu Lupu, Murray Perahia, Mitsuko Uchida, Andr√°s Schiff, Lars Vogt, Sunwook Kim, or Alim Beisembayev, former winners of this competition? You will find out by listening to these three artists during the second phase, the semi-final and the final, during which they will be accompanied by the Royal Liverpool Philharmonic Orchestra and Domingo Hindoyan.

programme.title: Carla Bley Sextet - Lugano Jazz Estival
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Discover the special bond between pianist Carla Bley and bassist Steve Swallow. The two have performed in the same bands since the 60s and have been romantic partners for more than two decades. Watching them perform is the definition of musical telepathy. Together with musicians Wayne Krantz, Victor Lewis, Larry Willis, and Don Alias, they form an amazing sextet at Estival in 1986.

programme.title: Glenn Gould - Hereafter
programme.desc: HEREAFTER is a retrospective of the life and work of Gould, seen from todays point of view. Based a synthesis of all the documents existing on Gould, whether of a musical or of a literary and intellectual nature, this film strives to deal with the question of Goulds genius such as it is perceived by his audience, an audience that extends far beyond the strict notion of a musical audience. It is made with the participation of anonymous "disciples", making it seem as if Gould himself was answering their questions; meanwhile, Gould appears as the master of the narration of the film. Serge Prokofiev Vision Fugitive op.22 n¬∞1 Johannes Brahms Intermezzo op.

programme.sub-title: Mozart: Idomeneo - Opera Royal de Wallonie-Li√®ge
programme.desc: Idomeneo, re di Creta "Dramma per musica" in three acts, K 366, by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (1756 - 1791) Libretto by Giovanni Battista Varesco after "Idomenee" by Antoine Danchet First performance in Munich, Residenztheater, January 29, 1781 Orchestra of the Opera Royal de Wallonie-Li√®ge, Fabio Biondi (Conductor) Chorus of the Opera Royal de Wallonie-Li√®ge Jean-Louis Grinda (stage director) Laurent Castaingt (Set designer), Laurent Castaingt (Lighting designer), Jorge Jara (Costume designer), Arnaud Pottier (Video designer) Maria Grazia Schiavo (Ilia) Ian Koziara (Idomeneo) Annalisa Stroppa (Idamante) Nino Machaidze (Elettra) Riccardo Della Sciucca (Arbace) Inho Jeong (La Voce) Li√®ge, Opera Royal de Wallonie, 19 September 2023

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: The Geordies are back but theres trouble in the Toon. Chloe and Sam have broken up but they still live together and to make things super awkward, theyre coming back into the house together...#Complicated! Annas kept the Newbies on! Nats coming back wanting to make stronger friendships with the other girls, Bethan and Beau are still seeing each other and Tahlias looking forward to chasing boys and, who knows, maybe even girls?! But to spice things up, the Boss is also bringing back Original Geordie James and Party Animal Abbie. James is single and ready to mingle and Abbies got a boyfriend but is ready to fight for her place in the house, which doesnt go down well with Beau and Bethan. Chloe and Sams relationship status changes like the wind but things come to a head when a secret about Chloe in Ibiza is revealed! Nay fear though, Nathan makes sure the family doesnt fall apart and the Squad are as Radge as ever, they party hard in Portugal and even give camping a go - its a pure frisk!

programme.title: Ink Master
programme.desc: Reality competition series. Some of Americas most ambitious tattoo artists compete in a series of challenges showcasing their remarkable skills and artistic styles. The artists will have to "ink on their feet" if they are to prevail, as in each episode a contestant is eliminated from the show, with the last artist standing taking home the whopping $100,000 prize and, of course, the heralded title of Ink Master. The contestants works are judged by both experts in the industry and tattoo enthusiasts. Presented by Dave Navarro, guitarist of rock band Janes Addiction and former guitarist of the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: This reality show follows the journeys of four teenage girls, and their journeys into motherhood. We follow the trials and tribulations they face as they reach a new milestone in their life; entering motherhood. There will be some lows but also the most incredible highs, as with any new parent. They will be learning on the job, and the show follows them every step of the way, looking at how their relationships, education, and financial situations change, too.

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.sub-title: A Whole New Era of Parenting
programme.desc: Maci and Ryan come together to buy Bentley a car for his 16th birthday. Leahs twins start high school and assert their independence. Ashley learns she will have to testify against Bar and gets a call from an unlikely supporter - Cheyenne.

programme.title: Valede v√µrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful tracks host Tami Roman as she sets out on a mission to empower suspicious lovers to catch their cheating partners in the act. With the help of a relationship expert and a private investigator, Tami will uncover the shocking truths and get the receipts to expose the cheats. Once the investigation is complete, the suspicious lover can choose to team up with their partners other lover or take them both down in an undercover ambush. In a life-altering confrontation, Tamis tough love approach will help the heartbroken find the answers they need to make the ultimate decision - move forward together or end their relationship for good. Will Tamis exposure bring these lovers closure?

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore OGs return for a spin off series that sees them get up to their old antics on holiday. Heading of on vacation together for the month, see if the cast are still up for a Blast in a Glass or if theyve mellowed out now theyre supposed to be real adults. With a wedding on the cards and an ongoing court case, will they even have time to Jersey Turnpike? Reunite with the OGs again and get an update on how life after the Shore is treating them, over ten years since they first burst onto our screens.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: MTV Top 20
programme.desc: Lets take a look at some of the biggest hits that are circulating the globe right now in this top 20 countdown!

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: Cribs
programme.desc: MTV CRIBS returns with a whole new vibe and a never before seen look into the everyday and unexpected lifestyles and rituals of your favorite personalities and their families, as they welcome us into their homes for a one of-a-kind exclusive tour.

programme.title: Cribs
programme.sub-title: Martha Stewart / Nick Young / Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: We visit NBA Champion Nick Young and his family at their swaggy LA home, then head over to Calabasas to hang out with Jordyn Woods, and finish the tour with the undefeated homemaker, Martha Stewart at her legendary east coast estate.

programme.title: Geddy Lee Asks
programme.desc: Geddy tours Les Claypools Rancho Relaxo in Sonoma County, California, where the two compare playing styles and see how Less custom Pachyderm Bass is constructed, go fishing on his private pond, visit his winery and indulge in wine and wieners.

programme.title: Geddy Lee Asks
programme.desc: Metallica bassist Robert Trujillo gives Geddy a tour of his psychedelic casa and shows off his surfing chops at the beach. They cruise the Venice Beach boardwalk to catch some hardcore skateboarding, score some tacos and check out the LA nightlife.

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: After years away from the Challenge, twenty-two of the games most legendary players reunite for the first time to redeem past mistakes, repair broken relationships, and be pushed to their physical, mental and emotional limits in pursuit of $500,000.

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: After years away from the Challenge, twenty-two of the games most legendary players reunite for the first time to redeem past mistakes, repair broken relationships, and be pushed to their physical, mental and emotional limits in pursuit of $500,000.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.sub-title: She Has a Whole Other Apartment?
programme.desc: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful tracks host Tami Roman as she sets out on a mission to empower suspicious lovers to catch their cheating partners in the act. With the help of a relationship expert and a private investigator, Tami will uncover the shocking truths and get the receipts to expose the cheats. Once the investigation is complete, the suspicious lover can choose to team up with their partners other lover or take them both down in an undercover ambush. In a life-altering confrontation, Tamis tough love approach will help the heartbroken find the answers they need to make the ultimate decision - move forward together or end their relationship for good. Will Tamis exposure bring these lovers closure?

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful tracks host Tami Roman as she sets out on a mission to empower suspicious lovers to catch their cheating partners in the act. In a life-altering confrontation, Tamis tough love approach will help the heartbroken find the answers they need to make the ultimate decision - move forward together or end their relationship for good. Will Tamis exposure bring these lovers closure?

programme.title: Valede v√µrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Zack invited van-lifer, Chelsea, to move in with him a year ago. It wasnt long before they went from roommates to being a couple. Zacks head over heels and wants to propose to Chelsea but cant until he knows why shes hiding him.

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Tangy and Jenny have built a beautiful life together with Jennys five Children. Tangy wants to propose and become a legal guardian, but she cant until she figures out why Jenny is hiding her from everyone else in her life.

Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Eyes on the Pride. Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett, the story of Malika is one of hardship, loneliness, and determination. She must battle her uncles to establish a territory of her own where she can start a family.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Death Knocks. Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Wild Mediterranean
programme.desc: A wealth of wildlife make their homes in the Mediterraneans serene waters, along its vast coastlines and on its remote islands.

programme.title: Europes Wild Places Mashup
programme.desc: Europe is covered in deep snow, forcing hardships on its wildlife. Lynx and mountain savvy chamois are built to withstand storms and avalanches.

programme.title: Europes Wild Places Mashup
programme.desc: Spring brings baby wildlife across Europe. Parents teach and protect, as younglings must quickly learn to survive.

programme.title: Ultimate Rivals
programme.desc: Canines and felines have been living side by side in Africa for hundreds of thousands of years, and theyve never really gotten along-not even amongst themselves. Throw the hyena into the mix and theyre all nightmare neighbors? Stealing from each other; harassing each other; eating each others young. Avoidance might be the only way to stay alive. Cats, dogs and the wild-card hyena, all jousting in a free for all for survival.

programme.title: Wild Mediterranean
programme.desc: A wealth of wildlife make their homes in the Mediterraneans serene waters, along its vast coastlines and on its remote islands.

programme.title: Europes Wild Places Mashup
programme.desc: Europe is covered in deep snow, forcing hardships on its wildlife. Lynx and mountain savvy chamois are built to withstand storms and avalanches.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Kiskjate saladused
programme.desc: Secret Life of Predators is a National Geography documentary series narrated by Boone Smith, exploring animals that are on the top of the food chains in the environments they inhabit, such as eagles, tigers and bears. Meet some of the deadliest creatures, from rainforests and African savannas to the depths of the ocean. Find out the strategies these animals use to fight for their survival, and why are these hunter species the most successful when it comes to it.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Journey across Africa exploring the continents most iconic and deadliest predators. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Hunters of the Wild. The King Cobra, the worlds longest venomous snake. The black mamba, a lightning-fast predator that strikes with astonishing accuracy. And the rattlesnake, the icon of Americas west known for its telltale warning.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Vipers rule deserts and haunt the forest floor. Meet a snake family as diverse as the challenges they face in their quest for survival.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Cobra. Charmed by some, feared by most, the cobra family is powerful and iconic. From giant cannibalistic king cobras in India to desert specialists that hunt birds in the Kalahari and semi aquatic Forest cobras stalking toads in African swamps.

programme.title: Destination Wild
programme.desc: From the towering peaks of the Himalayas to the rainforests of the Western Ghats, life is a daily battle in Indias mountains. These ranges provide a vital refuge for some of the countrys most iconic and tenacious species. Rhino and elephant thrive here, alongside top predators and rare and exotic animals - all fighting to survive in Indias unforgiving frontiers.

programme.title: Destination Wild
programme.desc: Indias monsoon forest is a place of both sanctuary and extremes. All must live by the law of the seasons.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild India
programme.desc: At first glance the desert of Indias north-west appear devoid of life. But even in the most hostile environments wildlife thrives. In this inhospitable place, only the best adapted survive. Here, in the harsh deserts and salty drylands, live Indias specialists. They have to endure extreme hardship, sandstorms, droughts, and intense heat

programme.title: Destination Wild
programme.desc: From the towering peaks of the Himalayas to the rainforests of the Western Ghats, life is a daily battle in Indias mountains. These ranges provide a vital refuge for some of the countrys most iconic and tenacious species. Rhino and elephant thrive here, alongside top predators and rare and exotic animals - all fighting to survive in Indias unforgiving frontiers.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Cobra. Charmed by some, feared by most, the cobra family is powerful and iconic. From giant cannibalistic king cobras in India to desert specialists that hunt birds in the Kalahari and semi aquatic Forest cobras stalking toads in African swamps.

programme.title: Kiskjate saladused
programme.desc: Secret Life of Predators is a National Geography documentary series narrated by Boone Smith, exploring animals that are on the top of the food chains in the environments they inhabit, such as eagles, tigers and bears. Meet some of the deadliest creatures, from rainforests and African savannas to the depths of the ocean. Find out the strategies these animals use to fight for their survival, and why are these hunter species the most successful when it comes to it.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: Vipers rule deserts and haunt the forest floor. Meet a snake family as diverse as the challenges they face in their quest for survival.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. programme.sub-title: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses
programme.desc: Best Foes: Kowalski invents an enemy detector. As is often the case, it doesnt work, and Skipper gets his own wires crossed when he smashes it. Old enemies are now friends and old friends are now enemies as the boss bird starts to systematically clean out the zoo with the help of his new friend Hans. King Julien gets into the act by becoming Skippers friend too, going so far as to Congaga dance together. New BFF Hans is not happy with the new bromance, however. Could this be the opening the penguins need? Night of the Vesuviuses: The annual Zoo Snooze is here! Kids get to buy tickets for a zoo sleepover, a treat the animals look forward to every year! This years going to be very different, however, when the rotten Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets themselves. The zoosters plan to turn the tables, though, and exact sweet revenge on the twins. The penguins, influenced by Private of course, cant let this happen, and its a long nights journey into day as the penguins scramble to protect their one-time tormentors.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.sub-title: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses
programme.desc: Best Foes: Kowalski invents an enemy detector. As is often the case, it doesnt work, and Skipper gets his own wires crossed when he smashes it. Old enemies are now friends and old friends are now enemies as the boss bird starts to systematically clean out the zoo with the help of his new friend Hans. King Julien gets into the act by becoming Skippers friend too, going so far as to Congaga dance together. New BFF Hans is not happy with the new bromance, however. Could this be the opening the penguins need? Night of the Vesuviuses: The annual Zoo Snooze is here! Kids get to buy tickets for a zoo sleepover, a treat the animals look forward to every year! This years going to be very different, however, when the rotten Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets themselves. The zoosters plan to turn the tables, though, and exact sweet revenge on the twins. The penguins, influenced by Private of course, cant let this happen, and its a long nights journey into day as the penguins scramble to protect their one-time tormentors.

programme.title: Das Pantheon - Roms antiker Superbau
programme.desc: Das Pantheon in Rom ist ein symboltrachtiges Bauwerk, aber auch ein wahres architektonisches Wunder! Seine AusmaSSe sind auSSergewohnlich und viele Geheimnisse ranken sich um seinen Bau. Wie sieht das Fundament aus, das ein solches Monument tragen kann? Wie halt die Kuppel ohne sichtbare Pfeiler? Nachdem es zwei Brande uberstanden hat, geplundert und teilweise zerstort wurde, thront das Pantheon immer noch im Zentrum Roms.
